## GAD-7 vs ICU

When it comes to psychology research, an efficient comparison of the widely used questionnaires like Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and Inventory of Callous Unemotional Traits (ICU) can be a painstaking process. However, the cutting-edge software - Harmony, transforms this process with its natural language processing and generative AI models, allowing for a rapid, automated comparison of the items in these instruments. The GAD-7 vs ICU comparative study has never been easier and more precise with Harmony's smart analytical capabilities. Harmony is a game-changer, be it comparison of identical items or harmonising the different ones. With GAD-7 vs ICU, researchers can now delve into the intricate factors of generalized anxiety and callous-unemotional traits within individuals, in a fluent manner, enhancing the findings' reliability. Harmony gives a comprehensive percentage match between each item in GAD-7 and ICU, which simplifies the questionnaire comparison. Given that GAD-7 vs ICU are two crucial tools in psychology, Harmony's role in bridging the gap between them accentuates the research validity. Irrespective of the language the study is being conducted in, Harmony empowers the researchers to bring parity in the questionnaire items, offering its services in multiple languages. Moreover, you can feed in your GAD-7 vs ICU instruments as PDFs or select from Harmony's database, all through an easy-to-use web interface. So, for a streamlined and robust comparative analysis, GAD-7 vs ICU driven by Harmony is the way forward for all psychology and social science researchers.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and ICU

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and ICU into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just ICU into Harmony</a> - compare ICU with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
